title: Blake Lively says she's 'picked a good one' in cheeky Ryan Reynolds birthday pic

Blake Lively has hailed her husband Ryan Reynolds on his 43rd birthday with a cheeky snap.

The 32-year-old Gossip Girl actress has a history of trolling the Deadpool star on his annual celebration and this time is no different.

Blake shared a pic with her 25 million Instagram followers of her shoving a finger up Ryan's nose, which she captured: ""I picked a good one. Happy birthday @vancityreynolds."

Ryan and Blake married in 2012 and have publicly trolled each other on social media over the years.

For the Canadian-American actor's 41st birthday, Blake shared a picture of Reynolds with fellow star Ryan Gosling - cropping most of her husband's face from the image.

(Image: Blake Lively /Instagram)

(Image: Blake Lively /Instagram)

She captioned that post: "Happy birthday baby."

Earlier this month, the couple confirmed they had welcomed their third child together, a daughter.

Blake and Ryan were already parents to daughters James, four, and Inez, three.

(Image: Corbis via Getty Images)

It took a while for the pair to actually hook up after being friends for a long time while single.

Speaking to Entertainment Weekly, Blake revealed: "We were such good friends for so long and we both got to know each other as friends so when we were both single, we were still trying to find each other's [perfect date] - 'Oh, who would be good for you?'"

(Image: Jackie Brown)

Blake continued to describe how they eventually found each other romantically: "We'd sit around being like, 'Oh jeez, do you know anyone?' And it didn't click for, I mean, a good year and a half. Like, 'Oh hey, wait, hold on. We could date!'"

Reynolds was previously married to actress Scarlett Johansson from 2008 to 2011.

description: With Ryan Reynolds celebrating his 43rd birthday, Blake Lively put her finger on why she loves her husband so much
